drug.name: diphtheria, tetanus, acellular pertussis, polio, haemophilus influenzae type b conjugate vaccine (DTaP-IPV-Hib) inj VIAL

drugname.value: diphtheria, tetanus, acellular pertussis, polio, haemophilus influenzae type b conjugate vaccine (DTaP-IPV-Hib) inj VIAL

additionalnotes.value: Routine immunization is a 4 dose series at 2, 4, 6, and 18 months of age. Alternatively the first 3 doses are administered at 2 month intervals and the fourth dose followed at 6 to 12 months after the third dose.

population.value: INFANT/CHILDREN, aged 2 months and up to 6 years.
